body:
Use the  [Find a court or tribunal](https://www.gov.uk/find-court-tribunal) service to find out how to contact HMCTS about any other court and tribunal service.

## If your query is urgent

We aim to respond to queries we receive through this service within 10 working days.  if your query is urgent, call:

* 0300 123 1072 for [Probate enquiries](https://) 
* 0300 303 0642 for [divorce enquiries](https://) 
* 0300 123 1372Â for [Court claims for money](https://) 

Our call centres are open Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
heading: Contact HMCTS
lede: Use this form to contact HMCTS about a probate or divorce application, or about a court claim for money
